name: GeometriesTest
description: Unit tests for the Geometries class, focusing on normalization of longitude and creation of geographic rectangles and points.

test_cases.name: testPrivateConstructorForCoverageOnly
test_cases.description: Tests the utility class assertion for Geometries.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at 0 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude2
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at 89 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude3
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at 179 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude3_1
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at 180 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude3_2
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at -180 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude3_3
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at -179 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude3_4
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at -181 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude4
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at 181 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude5
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at 541 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude2Neg
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at -89 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude3Neg
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at -179 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude4Neg
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at -181 degrees.

test_cases.name: testNormalizeLongitude5Neg
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of longitude at -541 degrees.

test_cases.name: testRectangleLatLong
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a geographic rectangle and its properties.

test_cases.name: testRectangleLatLong2
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of another geographic rectangle and its properties.

test_cases.name: testPointLatLong
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a geographic point and its properties.
